info.title: ClearBank Financial Institutions API
info.description:
The ClearBank® API is a REST based API that can be connected to in order to leverage ClearBank®’s products and banking services.

This ClearBank® Financial Institution API area in Swagger provides Financial Institutions with the required API endpoint information and message schema.

For the necessary information in order for Financial Institutions to successfully connect to ClearBank®’s API, refer to the Knowledge Centre.

All information is provided to you on a confidential basis and shall remain the property of ClearBank Ltd (including ownership rights in all intellectual property). All information is provided "as is" and without any implied warranty, representation, condition or otherwise, regarding its accuracy or completeness.

Copyright ClearBank Ltd. Authorised by the Prudential Regulation Authority and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority and the Prudential Regulation Authority (Financial Services Register number: 754568). Registered Address: ClearBank, Borough Yards, 13 Dirty Lane, London, SE1 9PA.

get.summary: You can call this endpoint to retrieve a sole trader by their customer ID.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: X-Request-Time
parameters.description: The current UNIX timestamp in seconds. This value will be rejected if it is more than 60 seconds late.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer, given as a UUID V4.

get.summary: You can call this endpoint to retrieve all related parties to a given customer by their customer ID.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: X-Request-Time
parameters.description: The current UNIX timestamp in seconds. This value will be rejected if it is more than 60 seconds late.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer.

post.summary: You can use this endpoint to relate one customer to another.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the original customer.

requestBody.description: Information required to add related party to customer

post.summary: You can use this endpoint to update a customer's current address. When you add a new current address, the previous address history is retained.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer.

requestBody.description: Information required to update the customer's address

delete.summary: You can call this endpoint to removes a related party link between two customers.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: X-Request-Time
parameters.description: The current UNIX timestamp in seconds. This value will be rejected if it is more than 60 seconds late.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer

parameters.name: relatedCustomerId
parameters.description: The ID of the related customer to unlink.

put.summary: You can use this endpoint to add to or update a sole trader's identity documents. This endpoint returns 200 OK when you update an existing ID, or 201 Created when you add a new ID.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer.

parameters.name: idCountryOfIssue
parameters.description: Country of issue, given as a 3-letter ISO 3166-1 country-code.

parameters.name: idType
parameters.description: The type of identity document. Possible values include: 'Passport', 'DrivingLicence', and 'NationalId'.

requestBody.description: The updated details of the identity document.

delete.summary: You can call this endpoint to removes a customer's existing identity document.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: X-Request-Time
parameters.description: The current UNIX timestamp in seconds. This value will be rejected if it is more than 60 seconds late.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer.

parameters.name: idCountryOfIssue
parameters.description: The ID's country of issue, given as a 3-letter ISO 3166-1 country-code.

parameters.name: idType
parameters.description: Type of identity document. Possible values include: 'Passport', 'DrivingLicence', and 'NationalId'.

put.summary: Adds or updates a customer's tax residency entry for the specified country. Returns 200 OK when updating an existing tax residency, or 201 Created when adding a new tax residency.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer.

parameters.name: countryOfTaxResidence
parameters.description: Country of tax residence.

requestBody.description: Tax residency details (TIN or reason for no TIN).

delete.summary: Removes a customer's tax residency entry for the specified country.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: X-Request-Time
parameters.description: The current UNIX timestamp in seconds. This value will be rejected if it is more than 60 seconds late.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer.

parameters.name: countryOfTaxResidence
parameters.description: Country of tax residence to remove.

post.summary: You can use this endpoint to create a new sole trader customer.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

requestBody.description: Information required to create a sole trader

patch.summary: You can use this endpoint to update certain details of an existing sole trader customer.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Your API token, retrieved from the web portal.

parameters.name: DigitalSignature
parameters.description: Signed hash of the body of the request. The hash is signed by your private key.

parameters.name: X-Request-Id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the request.

parameters.name: X-Request-Time
parameters.description: The current UNIX timestamp in seconds. This value will be rejected if it is more than 60 seconds late.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: The ID of the customer.

requestBody.description: Information required to update a retail customer

buildingNameNumber.description: The building name or number at this address.

postalCode.description: Postal code of the customer's address.

validFrom.description: The date from which the customer started living at this address, formatted: yyyy-MM-dd.

isCurrentAddress.description: Indicates if this is the customer's current address.

buildingNameNumber.description: The building name or number at this address.

postalCode.description: Postal code of the customer's address.

validFrom.description: The date from which the customer started living at this address, formatted: yyyy-MM-dd.

validTo.description: The date at which the customer stopped living at this address, formatted: yyyy-MM-dd.

isCurrentAddress.description: Indicates if this is the customer's current address.

PreviousAddressGetResponse.description: The details of the customer's previous address history.

currentAddresses.description: The current addresses of the customer. Contains at most 1 of each type.

previousAddresses.description: The previous addresses of the customer.

AddressHistoryMultipleCurrentAddressesGe.description: Addresses associated with a customer that has multiple current addresses.

AddressType.description: Represents the type of the address

sectorCode.description: Updated sector code (if changed) - this should always be '_8b_UnincorporatedBusinessesOtherThanLLPs'.

BusinessClassificationPatchModel.description: Patch model containing SoleTrader business classification fields that were updated.

tradingName.description: The trading name of the business.

annualRevenue.description: The annual revenue of the business.

BusinessDetailsPatchModel.description: Patch model containing SoleTrader business details that were updated.

CountryCode.description: 3-letter country codes as defined in ISO 3166-1

CraRating.description: The customer's CRA rating. Determined by the outcomes of your due diligence checks.

CreateBusinessClassificationRequest.description: Request to create a business classification.

tradingName.description: The trading name of the business.

annualRevenue.description: The annual revenue of the business.

idNumber.description: The ID number of the identity document.

idExpiryDate.description: Expiry date of the document, formatted: yyyy-MM-dd.

CreateCustomerIdentityDocumentRequest.description: Create an identity document for a customer.

sanctions.description: Indicates if the customer is currently under sanctions.

CreateMultipleAddressHistoryRequest.description: The customer's address history where they have multiple current addresses. For example, a trading address and a residential address.

dateOfBirth.description: The customer's date of birth, formatted: yyyy-MM-dd.

nationalIdentificationNumber.description: The customer's national identification number, such as their National Insurance (NI) number.

relatedCustomerId.description: The ID of the customer to be linked as a related party.

ownershipPercentage.description:
The ownership percentage of the related party. 
Optional: applies only to UBO relationship types.

CreateRelatedPartyRequest.description: A request to link one customer to another as a related party.

specialStatuses.description: The customer's special statuses, if any. Possible values include: 'Vulnerability_Health_VisualImpairmentBraille', 'Vulnerability_Health_VisualImpairmentLargeText', 'Vulnerability_Health_AudioImpairment', 'Vulnerability_Health_Other', 'Vulnerability_LifeEvents', 'Vulnerability_Resilience', and 'Vulnerability_Capability'

CreateSoleTraderRequest.description: Request body for creating a sole trader type customer.

taxResidencies.description: Gets or sets the collection of tax residencies to be created as part of the request.

vatRegistrationNumber.description: VAT registration number of the business.

CreateSoleTraderTaxDetailsRequest.description: Tax details for a sole trader customer.

CreateTaxResidencyRequest.description: Request to create a information about a customer's tax residency, including country of tax residence and tax identification details.

customerId.description: Unique identifier for the linked customer

relatedCustomerId.description: Unique identifier for the linked individual

CreatedRelatedPartyResponse.description: Response containing information about the created related party

id.description: Unique identifier for the created resource. If creating a customer, you should retain this for future reference.

CreatedResourceResponse.description: Response containing information about the created resource

buildingNameNumber.description: The building name or number of this address.

postalCode.description: Postal code of the customer's address.

validFrom.description: Date from which the address is valid, formatted: yyyy-MM-dd. Defaults to today if unspecified.

CustomerStatus.description: Represents the status of a customer in the system.

customerId.description: The ID of the customer under which the subresource was created.

CustomerSubresourceCreatedResponse.description: Represents the response returned when a subresource is created for a customer.

idNumber.description: The ID number of the identity document.

expiryDate.description: The expiry date of the identity document, formatted: yyyy-MM-dd.

sanctions.description: Indicates if the customer is under sanctions.

KycAmlPatchModel.description:
Patch model containing KYC/AML fields that were updated.
Only properties that changed are present.

PepType.description: Indicates if the customer is a Politically Exposed Person.

dateOfBirth.description: Customer's date of birth, formatted: yyyy-MM-dd.
Updated date of birth (if changed), formatted: yyyy-MM-dd.

PersonalDetailsPatchModel.description:
Patch model containing personal detail fields that were updated.
Only properties that changed are present.

buildingNameNumber.description: The building name or number of this address.

streetName.description: The street name of this address.

postalCode.description: Postal code of the customer's address.

validFrom.description: Date from which the address is valid, formatted: yyyy-MM-dd.

validTo.description: Date until which the address was valid, formatted: yyyy-MM-dd.

type.description: A URI reference [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type. This specification encourages that, when dereferenced, it provides human-readable documentation for the problem type (e.g., using HTML [W3C.REC-html5-20141028]). When this member is not present, its value is assumed to be "about:blank".

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization (e.g., using proactive content negotiation; see[RFC7231], Section 3.4).

status.description: The HTTP status code([RFC7231], Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem. It may or may not yield further information if dereferenced.

ProblemDetails.description: A machine-readable format for specifying errors in HTTP API responses based on https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7807

RcaType.description: Indicates if the customer is a Relative or Close Associate.

ReasonForNoTaxId.description: Supported reasons for not having a tax ID (required if no tax ID number provided)

ownershipPercentage.description: The related party's ownership percentage, expressed as an integer.

id.description: The unique identifier of the customer.

institutionId.description: The unique identifier of the institution associated with this customer.

specialStatuses.description: The customer's special statuses, if any. Possible values include: 'Vulnerability_Health_VisualImpairmentBraille', 'Vulnerability_Health_VisualImpairmentLargeText', 'Vulnerability_Health_AudioImpairment', 'Vulnerability_Health_Other', 'Vulnerability_LifeEvents', 'Vulnerability_Resilience', and 'Vulnerability_Capability'

SoleTraderCustomerGetResponse.description: The Sole Trader Customer type response body

customerId.description: The unique identifier of the Sole Trader customer.

specialStatuses.description: Special statuses that changed (only present if amended).

SoleTraderPatchResponse.description:
Summary of the fields that have been updated for sole trader PATCH.
Contains only sections and properties that were changed.

vatRegistrationNumber.description: VAT registration number of the business.

SoleTraderTaxDetailsPatchModel.description: Patch model containing SoleTrader tax detail fields that were updated.

taxResidencies.description: Collection of tax residencies of the customer

vatRegistrationNumber.description: VAT registration number of the business.

USPerson.description: Specifies the classification of a person as a U.S. person for regulatory or reporting purposes.

UpdateBusinessClassificationRequest.description:
Business Classification update request.
Null values are ignored.

tradingName.description:
The trading name of the business.
Null value is ignored

annualRevenue.description:
The annual revenue of the business.
Null value is ignored

UpdateBusinessDetailsRequest.description:
Business Details update request.
Null values are ignored.

buildingNameNumber.description: Building name or number of the customer's new address.

streetName.description: Street name of the customer's new address.

city.description: City of the customer's new address.

county.description: County of the customer's new address.

postalCode.description: Postal code of the customer's new address.

validFrom.description: Date from which the customer's new address is valid, formatted: yyyy-MM-dd. Defaults to today if unspecified.

idExpiryDate.description: Expiry date of the identity document, formatted: yyyy-MM-dd.

sanctions.description:
Indicates if the customer is under sanctions.
Null value is ignored.

UpdateKycAmlRequest.description:
KYC AML update request.
Null values are ignored.

firstName.description:
The customer's first name.
Null value is ignored.

middleName.description:
The customer's middle name.
Null value is ignored.

surname.description:
The customer's surname.
Null value is ignored.

dateOfBirth.description:
The customer's date of birth, formatted: yyyy-MM-dd.
Null value is ignored.

email.description:
The customer's email address.
Null value is ignored.

telephone.description:
The customer's telephone number.
Null value is ignored.

nationalIdentificationNumber.description:
The customer's national identification number, such as their National Insurance (NI) number.
Null value is ignored.

UpdatePersonalDetailsRequest.description:
Personal Details update request.
Null values are ignored.

buildingNameNumber.description: Building name or number of the customer's previous address.

streetName.description: Street name of the customer's previous address.

city.description: City of the customer's previous address.

county.description: County of the customer's previous address.

postalCode.description: Postal code of the customer's previous address.

validFrom.description: Date from which the address is valid, formatted: yyyy-MM-dd.

validTo.description: Date until which the address was valid, formatted: yyyy-MM-dd.

specialStatuses.description:
Special Status update request.
Null value is ignored.
All existing special statuses will be replaced with the provided collection.
An empty collection will clear all special statuses.

UpdateSoleTraderRequest.description:
Sole Trader update request.
Null values are ignored.

vatRegistrationNumber.description: VAT registration number of the business.

UpdateSoleTraderTaxDetailsRequest.description: Tax details for a sole trader customer.

UpdateTaxResidencyRequest.description: The customer's tax residency update request.

type.description: A URI reference [RFC3986] that identifies the problem type. This specification encourages that, when dereferenced, it provides human-readable documentation for the problem type (e.g., using HTML [W3C.REC-html5-20141028]). When this member is not present, its value is assumed to be "about:blank".

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It SHOULD NOT change from occurrence to occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization (e.g., using proactive content negotiation; see[RFC7231], Section 3.4).

status.description: The HTTP status code([RFC7231], Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem. It may or may not yield further information if dereferenced.

ValidationProblemDetails.description: A machine-readable format for specifying errors in HTTP API responses based on https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7807
